| **Community Land Trusts (CLTs)**                     | None                           | `inventory`, `median_sale_price`, `new_listings`, `num_housing_units`                                                        |
| **Public-Private Partnerships**                      | None                           | `inventory`, `median_sale_price`, `new_listings`, `num_housing_units`                                                        |
